Schemes.name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana
Schemes.Benefits: Provides financial assistance of ₹6000 per year to small and marginal farmers.
Schemes.How It Works: Farmers receive three equal installments of ₹2000 directly into their bank accounts every four months.
Schemes.How to Apply: Visit PM Kisan portal and register online.

Schemes.name: Crop Insurance Scheme
Schemes.Benefits: Provides financial protection against crop losses due to natural calamities.
Schemes.How It Works: Farmers pay a minimal premium and receive compensation for losses.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through the agricultural office or online portal.

Schemes.name: Agricultural Infrastructure Fund
Schemes.Benefits: Supports farmers in building post-harvest management infrastructure.
Schemes.How It Works: Provides subsidized loans for storage and processing units.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply via the Agricultural Infrastructure Fund portal.

Schemes.name: Fasal Bima Yojana
Schemes.Benefits: Offers crop insurance against natural calamities and pests.
Schemes.How It Works: Farmers pay a small premium and get compensation in case of crop damage.
Schemes.How to Apply: Register online on the PMFBY portal.

Schemes.name: National Scholarship Scheme
Schemes.Benefits: Provides financial aid for higher education students from economically weaker sections.
Schemes.How It Works: Covers tuition fees and provides monthly stipends.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply on the National Scholarship Portal.

Schemes.name: Education Loan Subsidy Scheme
Schemes.Benefits: Offers interest subsidies on educational loans for eligible students.
Schemes.How It Works: Government pays the interest during the study period.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through banks participating in the scheme.

Schemes.name: Skill Development Training Program
Schemes.Benefits: Provides free skill development training to students and young professionals.
Schemes.How It Works: Covers tuition fees and offers placement assistance.
Schemes.How to Apply: Register on the Skill India Portal.

Schemes.name: Startup India Seed Fund
Schemes.Benefits: Funding support for students and graduates to start their own ventures.
Schemes.How It Works: Provides seed funding and incubation support.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply via the Startup India portal.

Schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana
Schemes.Benefits: Provides a guaranteed pension plan for senior citizens.
Schemes.How It Works: Retirees invest a lump sum and receive a fixed pension for 10 years.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply at LIC or authorized banks.

Schemes.name: Senior Citizen Savings Scheme
Schemes.Benefits: Provides safe investment options with high interest rates.
Schemes.How It Works: Retirees deposit savings and receive quarterly interest payouts.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply at post offices or banks.

Schemes.name: Varishtha Pension Bima Yojana
Schemes.Benefits: Offers pension benefits with an assured interest rate.
Schemes.How It Works: Provides monthly pensions based on a one-time premium deposit.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through LIC or government banks.

Schemes.name: Healthcare Insurance for Senior Citizens
Schemes.Benefits: Provides health insurance with coverage for critical illnesses.
Schemes.How It Works: Covers hospitalization expenses and medical costs.
Schemes.How to Apply: Register through insurance providers or government schemes.

Schemes.name: Teachers Welfare Fund
Schemes.Benefits: Provides financial assistance for teachers' professional development.
Schemes.How It Works: Grants for training and research opportunities.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through the Ministry of Education portal.

Schemes.name: Housing Loan Subsidy for Teachers
Schemes.Benefits: Offers subsidies on housing loans for teachers.
Schemes.How It Works: Teachers receive reduced interest rates on home loans.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through national banks or government portals.

Schemes.name: Higher Education Research Grants
Schemes.Benefits: Provides financial assistance for teachers conducting research.
Schemes.How It Works: Grants for publishing papers, attending conferences, and research projects.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply via the UGC portal.

Schemes.name: Retirement Benefits for Teachers
Schemes.Benefits: Ensures pension and gratuity benefits for retiring teachers.
Schemes.How It Works: Teachers receive monthly pensions and lump sum gratuity.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through the education department or pension fund office.

Schemes.name: MGNREGA
Schemes.Benefits: Provides guaranteed 100 days of wage employment to rural unemployed individuals.
Schemes.How It Works: Rural unemployed individuals can work on government projects.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply at the Gram Panchayat office.

Schemes.name: Skill India Mission
Schemes.Benefits: Provides vocational training and employment opportunities.
Schemes.How It Works: Free skill training programs with job placement support.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through the Skill India portal.

Schemes.name: Self-Employment Loan Scheme
Schemes.Benefits: Offers loans for unemployed individuals to start small businesses.
Schemes.How It Works: Provides low-interest loans with flexible repayment options.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply through nationalized banks or financial institutions.

Schemes.name: Unemployment Allowance Scheme
Schemes.Benefits: Provides financial assistance to unemployed individuals actively seeking jobs.
Schemes.How It Works: Monthly stipend for a limited duration while searching for employment.
Schemes.How to Apply: Apply via the Employment Exchange office.
